Container.Name: GIMP V-3
Container.Description: GIMP is a free and open-source raster graphics editor[4] used for image retouching and editing, free-form drawing, converting between different image formats, and more specialized tasks. [br][br][b][u][span style='color: #E80000;']Configuration[/span][/u][/b][br] [b]/config[/b] : Folder where GIMP's configuration is stored[br] [b]8080[/b] : xRDP web-interface.[br] [b]3389[/b] : xRDP client interface
Container.Overview: GIMP is a free and open-source raster graphics editor[4] used for image retouching and editing, free-form drawing, converting between different image formats, and more specialized tasks.
